Among CBSE or Karnataka state board for class 12th, CBSE board is better for studies. The reason behind this is that there are huge number of schools available at every place due to which you can change your school if there is any need. Along with this, the syllabus and the course is same in each and every state of India. The syllabus is very easy in this board and all the rules are pre-defined due to which scoring marks become very easy for all the students. One of the major reason behind this is that among both these board, CBSE seems easy as compared to Karnataka state board. CBSE board is the best among all other boards as the value of this board is in entire India.
